content:
My memory says the evaluated specs were labeled V5.0 — but your frontend showing no result is significant. There are two possibilities:

One: the council ran in a session that never got linked to this project ID. The score of 4.3 exists in memory context but not attached to the project record in the system.

Two: what was evaluated wasn't truly V5.0 — it may have been an earlier draft that got retroactively labeled V5.

Either way, if you're not seeing a result in the frontend, the project has no official council verdict on record. That means we should run it fresh — especially if V5.0 "post-freedom design" represents a substantive departure from what the 4.3 verdict was based on.

Want me to kick off the council now against the current V5.0 specs? I'll pull the project details and submit it.
